entity.name: Supreme Court of the United States

text:
@realDonaldTrump Trump claims victory as Texas Supreme Court rules lack of coronavirus immunity doesn't qualify as disability requiring mail-in ballot.

Once again a Republican State Supreme Court rules against Americans rights to vote, their goal is to suppress minority votes.
